page.title: 11A Sunday With Jeremy.
page.content: At about one o'clock I make my way home for my dinner. After dinner I sometimes help my mum with washing the dishes and then I go out again while my mum and dad work in the garden or watch T.V. There isn't all that much to do around where I live so I often get bored. On the Prison Estate I also have a lot of friends and so I go up there to see them, but they are not always at home and so I go fishing at the Church Pond. It is quite a good place for fishing and the Scouts often go there canoeing. When I go home I listen to the Top Forty records on the radio and when that has finished I have a bath, then have tea with the family and we all watch a film on television. At about nine o'clock I go to bed.
